name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 - Uprising
name_original: Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 - Uprising
description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 - Uprising is an action-shooter game developed by Treyarch. It was originally released in 2013. It was published by Activision Blizzard. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 - Uprising is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
